Subject: Login Errors
Description: I was directed to submit a ticket by our account rep Nadine Guthrie. When logging in to https://5jfh4tl.hosted.endpointprotector.com/ using my credentials for adorville@segalbenz.com, I frequently get bounced to an login error page that either says: The username or password you entered is incorrect. Go back to the login page. OR Unfortunately, the login process encountered an error. Please try again The behavior is not consistent but my password is since I am auto-filling that from my 1Password entry for Endpoint Protector. Please let me know what other information you need to troubleshoot this.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer reported authentication issues. We asked for the details about auth method they are using, but in the meantime they have resolved the issue internally.
